CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ERP_Status__c = 'Completed' ,ERP_Status__c = 'Vendor Completed' ),
'Order is Shipped',
IF( OrderDueDate__c < TODAY() ,
'Order is Overdue by ' & TEXT(Order_OverDue_Flag__c) & ' days',
IF( OrderDueDate__c = TODAY(), 'Order is not due yet', 'Order is not due yet - Due in ' & TEXT(ABS(Order_OverDue_Flag__c)) & ' days')
) )
CustomField.label: Order is Past Due
